weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, what am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen in winter.
⛄ You can build with me.
☁️ I come from clouds.

weather.question: I help plants grow and keep you cool in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Plants need me to survive.
☔ I fall from the sky.
🌧️ I make puddles.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give light to the Earth.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I am bright.
🔥 I can make you feel very warm.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
💨 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ I move the clouds.

weather.question: I come after the rain and have many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have the colors of red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
✨ I appear when the sun shines through raindrops.
🌉 I look like a colorful arch.

weather.question: I'm a big, puffy thing in the sky, sometimes white, sometimes gray. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can bring rain or sunshine.
🐑 I can look like animals or shapes.
🌬️ The wind helps me move across the sky.

weather.question: I am a loud noise and a flash of light, often during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very dangerous, you should stay inside.
🌩️ I come before the thunder.
🔊 I can light up the sky.

weather.question: I am a shaking of the earth, and sometimes weather can lead to me after a heavy rainfall. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️I can be destructive to buildings and cars.
🌊 I am a moving of the earth.
🌧️ Too much of the rain can lead to me.

weather.question: I am a giant swirling storm over the ocean, with strong winds and heavy rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌊 I cause flooding and damage to coastal areas.
🌬️ People track me on maps to see where I'm going.

weather.question: I am a very cold storm with lots of snow and strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can make it hard to see.
🥶 You need to wear many layers to stay warm.
🌬️Travel can be very dangerous.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I come out at night. I shine with my own light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle!
🌃 You see me in the dark.
🔥 I am made of hot gas.

cosmos.question: I am big and round and full of rock and ground. People live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants grow here.
🌍 I am the only planet known to have life.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, but I am not a car. I shine at night, even though I don't make my own light. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Sometimes people say I'm made of cheese!
🌔 I have phases.
🌎 I orbit the planet you live on.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of fire that gives Earth light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I rise in the East.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me!
🔥 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am a cold planet, and I am blue. I am the farthest planet from the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm very, very cold!
💨 Strong winds blow on me.
🪐 I am one of the eight planets in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I'm red and dusty, a rocky place. People have sent robots to explore my space. What am I?

hints.text: 🤖 Rovers explore my surface.
🔴 I am called the Red Planet.
🚀 People want to visit me one day!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some are named after animals.
✨ You can find me on a clear night.
📜 Ancient people told stories about me.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system, with a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a storm that's bigger than Earth!
🪐 I am made of gas.
🌑 I have lots of moons.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space, with a tail that glows. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ My tail always points away from the sun.
❄️ I am mostly made of frozen gases.
✨ I appear rarely, then disappear

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, dust, and gas, held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I have a spiral shape.
✨ I contain billions of stars.
🥛 Our solar system is just a tiny part of me.
